name: Quality Issue RSM
query:
SELECT 
qi.rsm_full_name as 'RSM Name:Data:150',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.name) from `tabQuality Issue` qb WHERE ((DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 8) AND qi.rsm_name = qb.rsm_name)) as 'Less than one week:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.name) from `tabQuality Issue` qb WHERE (((DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 15) AND (DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) > 7)) AND qi.rsm_name = qb.rsm_name)) as 'More than one week:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.name) from `tabQuality Issue` qb WHERE (((DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 22) AND (DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) > 14)) AND qi.rsm_name = qb.rsm_name)) as 'More than two weeks:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.name) from `tabQuality Issue` qb WHERE (((DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) < 29) AND (DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) > 21)) AND qi.rsm_name = qb.rsm_name)) as 'More than three weeks:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(qb.name) from `tabQuality Issue` qb WHERE ((DATEDIFF(NOW(),qb.creation) >28) AND qi.rsm_name = qb.rsm_name)) as 'More than one month:Data:250'
FROM `tabQuality Issue` qi
Inner Join 
`tabSKU Details` sd
WHERE sd.parent = qi.name
GROUP BY
qi.rsm_name

UNION

select 'Grand Total',CAST(sum(DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) < 8) AS int), CAST(sum(DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) < 15 AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) > 7) AS int), 
CAST(sum((DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) < 22) AND (DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) > 14)) AS int), CAST((sum(DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) < 29 AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) > 21)) AS int),
CAST(sum(DATEDIFF(NOW(),qi.creation) > 28) AS int) from `tabQuality Issue` qi;
